short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify that the page and links, images, CSS files, and JavaScript are using HTTPS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check and ensure that the current web page and its associated resources, such as links, images, CSS files, and JavaScript, are using secure HTTPS connections.
